# Feature: Analytics Dashboard for Conversion Performance

## User Request
Analytics dashboard for conversion performance

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create a new Dashboard page or section
- [ ] Visualize conversion rates, total conversions, and trends over time
- [ ] Allow filtering by date range or campaign
- [ ] Backend endpoint to aggregate conversion data

## Technical Approach
Use a charting library (e.g., Recharts) to display data. Create an AnalyticsService or API route to aggregate data from the database.

## Files Expected to Change
- src/app/dashboard/analytics/page.tsx
- src/components/analytics/*.tsx
- src/services/analytics.ts

## Out of Scope
- Advanced predictive analytics (phase 2)
